text: Millville is a city in Cumberland County, New Jersey, United States. As of the 2020 United States Census, the city's population was 27,491. Millville, Bridgeton and Vineland are the three main New Jersey cities of the Vineland- Millville-Bridgeton metropolitan statistical area.Community Profile: Vineland- Millville-Bridgeton, NJ Metropolitan Statistical Area (MSA) , Federal Reserve Bank of Philadelphia. Accessed May 21, 2012. ==References== Category:Cities in New Jersey
title: Millville, New Jersey
